Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeTotemDef.label: Totem of Hunger
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeTotemDef.description: Proof of a ravenous hunter. Each level grants a 1% increase to the satiation provided by consuming a heart while in beast form.\n\nThis totem can only by upgraded by completing the Hound beast hunts.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeTotemDef.label: Totem of Slaughter
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeTotemDef.description: Proof of a merciless hunter. Each level grants a 2% chance to reduce lycanthropic stress upon a landing a killing blow while in beast form.\n\nThis totem can only by upgraded by completing the Slaughter beast hunts.
